snippet.title: RIGS Mechanized Combat League | Nine Lives Vampire Ability | PlayStation VR
snippet.description:
Pilots of Nine Lives are some of the most ferocious around, with the Vampire ability allowing them to completely restore their shield upon taking down another player. 

Nine Lives is just one of the RIGS you can pilot in RIGS: Mechanized Combat League, exclusively on PlayStation VR from 13th October. Find out more: http://bit.ly/2bB3RlO

Preorder now: http://bit.ly/2cMZeBs
